message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a fair split that accounts for the inflation penalty I face. I'll take $55 and you get $45. If we go to the next round, the total value decreases for me due to inflation, which would hurt us both. This is a reasonable offer that leaves us both with a substantial amount.

Hi Alice, considering the inflation penalty affects you more, I've adjusted the split to still be somewhat fair but also reflects my advantage in this situation. If we continue, your share will only decrease in value.
